summary: 2002 VW JETTA WITH 1.8 TURBO. FAULTY IGNITION COIL REQUIRES DEALER REPLACEMENT. 1) PART ON BACK-ORDER, SO CAR REMAINS UNDRIVEABLE AND IN SHOP FOR UP TO 2 WEEKS. 2) VW POLICY IS TO NOT REPLACE OTHER 3 IGNITION COILS DESPITE KNOWN FAILURE RATE.  CAR IS UNDER WARRANTY AND DEALER & VW AMERICA ADMIT THAT PART IS DEFECTIVE, BUT CAR IS NO LONGER DEPENDABLE IN LIGHT OF RISK OF FUTURE COIL FAILURE.
